name: Merrell Coldpack Ice+ Moc Arctic Grip Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
categories: Coldpack Ice+ Moc Arctic Grip Waterproof Wint
description: Waterproof slip-ons that will keep you from slipping. Merrell has built the waterproof Coldpack Ice+ Moc atop a grippy sole featuring Vibram’s Arctic Grip™ rubber. Arctic Grip rubber is incredibly grippy on slick, icy surfaces, helping you stay upright on slippery winter terrain. With their warm fleece lining and waterproof full-grain leather upper these shoes are ready for winter.Vibram® Arctic Grip outsole provides incredible traction on wet ice. An aggressive tread pattern and deep lugs provide traction everywhere else.Full-grain leather and M Select™ DRY membrane keep the water out and let your feet breath.Conductor™ fleece lining is warm and wicks away moisture.Protective rubber rand and toe-cap help reinforce the shoe where it needs it most.Merrell’s air cushion heel absorbs impacts and combined with the EVA midsole, all-day comfort.Molded nylon arch shank offers comfortable support.
